channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New And Dangerous Android Attack—12 Words Are Targeted By Hackers
item.description: Android users have been warned that a dangerous new hack attack uses optical character recognition to grab passphrases from your smartphone.

item.description: What does a sunset on the moon look like? Abrupt, brief, dramatic.
